Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered pattern, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft, washed denim with embroidery. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with embroidered appliqués on the front, an adjustable elasticated waist and fly with a press-stud.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, frills over the shoulders, and narrow cuffs with a button and elasticated loop.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.

Romper suit in a cotton weave with frills at the top and narrow shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).

Romper suit in a cotton weave with frills at the top and narrow shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).

Romper suit in a cotton weave with frills at the top and narrow shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, lined hood with appliqués, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit containing wool and mohair in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing wool and mohair in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft cable knit. Size 27x220 cm.
